citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 0945am on
22-FEB-17.
The inspector made contact with the Licensee's daughter. She informed the inspector that no one was available for
inspection at that time.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 0945am on
22-FEB-17.
The inspector made contact with the Licensee's daughter.  She informed the inspector that no one was available for
inspection at that time.
